description: Verifies that the specified material is present in each equipment of a defined class and validates each material's quantity, expiry date, and reset date.
intent: Ensure the material defined by the recipe is correctly loaded and valid in all equipment of the specified class, and record any exceptions.
preconditions: Material and equipment class are defined in recipe authoring
postconditions: All equipment have been checked for the specified material
Material quantity, expiry date, and reset date have been validated
Exceptions are recorded if any verification fails
side_effects: May open the Safety Info page
May open the Exception page to record an exception
example_usage: Operator selects equipment class and BOM reference, reviews material in each listed equipment (quantity, expiry date, reset date), records any exceptions, and clicks Finish to complete the phase.
